body.p: In anticipation of a mid to late March release of Gentoo Linux 1.0, I've institued a "freeze" on all new non-essential ebuild submissions. The purpose of this ebuild freeze is to free developers from the huge stream of new ebuild submissions so that we can focus on fixing bugs as well as adding improvements necessary for Gentoo Linux 1.0. We expect the ebuild freeze to last at least a couple of weeks.
